Class JStack

java.lang.Object
  JStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Space
public class JStack
extends java.lang.Object
implements Space

When a token moves off of a JStack, they move to the same x and y coordinate on the z level that corresponds to their roll modulo the z dimension of the board.

takeTurn

public boolean takeTurn(Token t,
                        int roll,
                        int boardEnd)
Take token's turn. Print the token and the roll. Advance the player to their current x and y coordinate up (or down) the z level that corresponds to their roll modulo the z dimension of the board.

Specified by:
takeTurn in interface Space
Parameters:
t - token that is taking its turn.
roll - die roll for the turn.
boardEnd - the index of the final space on the board.
Returns:
if the token has reached the end of the board.

takeTurn

public boolean takeTurn(Token t,
                        int roll,
                        int boardEnd,
                        JStack initialSpace)
Take token's turn. Print the token and the roll. Advance the player to their current x and y coordinate up (or down) the z level that corresponds to their roll modulo the z dimension of the board.

Parameters:
initalSpace - the JStack that initiated this chain of landing.
